Sr No. Container No. Central Excise Seal No. BATCH CODE DOP DOE NOS OF DRUMS
Sr No. Container No. Central Excise Seal No. BATCH CODE DOP DOE NOS OF DRUMS
Sr No. Container No. Central Excise Seal No. BATCH CODE DOP DOE NOS OF DRUMS
Sr No. Container No. Central Excise Seal No. BATCH CODE DOP DOE NOS OF DRUMS

REMARKS:

1. Each drum is sealed with tamper evident proof seal with EF logo.

2. One sample bag with 2 blank labels is stuffed in the container & kept on first row from door.

3. Pine wood pallets used are heat treated as ISPM #15.

4. Four drums on each pallets are tied with PP strap at the top & bottom.

5. Client approved printed label with one year expiry date pasted on the drum.

6. Production dates & Best before dates are as mentioned on labels. Shelf life will remain more than 50% at the time of receiving to the client.

7. Kept 8 Nos of bags 0f 500 gms dry air dessicant in each container.

SIGN OF SUPERVISOR
name: Loading Supervision Report
